column4: Ok, how do I fix this Xlib:  extension "XFree86-DRI" missing on display ":0.0".
I have already disabled composite, rebooted, said all my magical incantations, to no avail.
I am TRYING to get my ati driver to work with 3d acceleration.
I still haven't got my ATI card to work properly after about 2 months, so instead I use a NVidia card.
